posts.postText: As of July 17th, i'll be gone for a week. (I know, this is like a week ahead of time, but it's just a heads up:o) I'll be in New Mexico with my friend Wes and his family, so I'll be gone from July 17th to July 24th.
Have a nice vacation!   Watch out for Kryzoid, Pirate and Tin... They will rape you.

>> As of June 17th 0-_0-, i'll be gone for a week. (I know, this is like a week ahead of time, but it's just a heads up:o) I'll be in New Mexico with my friend Wes and his family, so I'll be gone from July 17th to July 24th. 0-_0- 
June = July?

>> What part of NM? Angelfire?  I'm not sure at this point, BUT. I feel like a fucking derp.. I'm leaving JULY 17th, not June. So I posted this like a month ahead of time... lmao
